content:
Both Speedo and TYR often have sales, discounts, and promotions on their websites, especially during certain times of the year or for specific products.

**Speedo:**

* Speedo has a "Deals" section on their website where they feature discounted products, including swim caps.
* They often offer sales during holidays like Memorial Day, Fourth of July, and Labor Day.
* Speedo also has a "Clearance" section where they discount discontinued or last-season's products.
* You can sign up for their email newsletter to receive exclusive promotions and discounts.

**TYR:**

* TYR has a "Sale" section on their website where they feature discounted products, including swim caps.
* They often offer sales during holidays like Black Friday and Cyber Monday.
* TYR also has a "Closeout" section where they discount discontinued or last-season's products.
* You can sign up for their email newsletter to receive exclusive promotions and discounts.

**Tips:**

* Follow Speedo and TYR on social media (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter) to stay up-to-date on their latest promotions and sales.
* Use coupon codes or promo codes from online coupon websites like RetailMeNot or Coupons.com.
* Look for bundle deals or value sets that include swim caps and other swim gear.
* Consider purchasing last season's model or a previous version of the swim cap you're interested in, as they may be discounted.

Remember to always check the websites' terms and conditions for any sales or discounts, as they may have certain restrictions or limitations.

Good luck finding the perfect swim cap at a great price!
